title: Phase 5: Build system
description: Update package.json with bin entry and build scripts. Add: dev, build, build:win, build:linux, build:mac scripts using bun build --compile.

title: Phase 1: Foundation - Command interface and entry point
description: Create src/cli/commands/types.ts with Command interface (execute, showHelp). Create src/cli/index.ts as main entry point and router. Handle root --help and --version.

title: Phase 4: Migrate Docs commands
description: Create docs router (src/cli/commands/docs/index.ts). Migrate: update.ts (from update-claude-docs.ts).

title: Transform agent-plugin into ax CLI
description: Epic: Transform the collection of Bun/TypeScript scripts into a unified CLI tool named 'ax' with subcommand structure, compiled to single-file executables.

title: Rename CLI from ax to aide
description:
Renamed the CLI and all references from 'ax' (agent-extensions) to 'aide' (AI Development Extensions).

## Changes Made
- Renamed skills/ax/ directory to skills/aide/
- Updated TypeScript plugin files (install.ts, uninstall.ts, status.ts, index.ts)
- Updated embedded-plugin.ts import paths
- Updated package.json (name, bin entry, build output names)
- Updated plugin metadata (.claude-plugin/plugin.json, marketplace.json)
- Updated slash commands (commands/*.md) - allowed-tools and examples
- Updated skills/aide/SKILL.md content
- Updated documentation (README.md, CLAUDE.md, AGENTS.md)

## Result
- CLI command: aide
- Binaries: aide.exe, aide-linux, aide-mac
- Plugin paths: ~/.claude/plugins/aide/
- Slash commands: /aide:ticket, /aide:search, /aide:comment, /aide:update, /aide:pr
- Plugin identifier: aide@aide

title: Phase 1: Foundation - Unified argument parser
description: Create src/cli/parser.ts with parseCommand() function. Parse service (jira/ado/docs) and action. Handle flags and positional args. Support --help and --version at any level.

title: ax plugin install command
description: Add command to ax CLI that installs the Claude Code plugin from embedded files. Supports user/project/local scopes. Uses Bun's file embedding to bundle plugin assets into the compiled binary.

title: Set up plugin file embedding
description: Configure Bun build to embed plugin files (.claude-plugin/, commands/, skills/) into the compiled binary. Use import attributes or explicit file imports to work around Windows glob issues.

title: Create plugin service router
description: Add new service 'plugin' to ax CLI with subcommand routing. Structure: ax plugin <action>. Actions: install, uninstall, status.

title: Implement uninstall and status commands
description: Add ax plugin uninstall (remove files, clean settings) and ax plugin status (show installation info for each scope).

title: Update build system and documentation
description: Modify package.json build scripts to include embedded files. Update README with plugin install instructions. Test all three scopes on Windows.

title: Implement install command
description: Create ax plugin install command that: 1) Extracts embedded files to target location 2) Supports --user (default), --project, --local scopes 3) Updates settings.json to register plugin 4) Handles existing installations gracefully

title: Phase 6: Cleanup and documentation
description: Delete scripts/ directory and old standalone tools. Update CLAUDE.md, STUB_CLAUDE.md, README.md with new command structure and examples.

title: Phase 1: Foundation - Directory structure and libraries
description: Create src/cli/ and src/lib/ directories. Move shared libraries (jira-client.ts, azure-devops-client.ts, config.ts, types.ts, adf-to-md.ts, md-to-adf.ts, ado-utils.ts, comment-utils.ts, cli-utils.ts) to src/lib/. Update all import paths.

title: Phase 3: Migrate ADO commands
description: Create ADO router (src/cli/commands/ado/index.ts). Migrate: prs.ts (from ado-list-prs.ts), comments.ts (from ado-get-pr-comments.ts).

title: Create ax Claude Code Plugin
description: Build a Claude Code plugin for AI agent integration with Jira and Azure DevOps via the ax CLI. Plugin provides slash commands for ticket-driven development and PR review workflows.

title: Plugin Foundation - Create manifest files
description: Create .claude-plugin/plugin.json and marketplace.json for the ax plugin. Define plugin name, version, description, and author metadata.

title: Slash Commands - Jira ticket workflow
description: Create slash commands for Jira integration: /ax:ticket (load ticket context), /ax:search (search tickets), /ax:comment (add comment), /ax:update (update description)

title: Slash Commands - PR review workflow
description: Create slash command for Azure DevOps PR integration: /ax:pr (load PR comments and context for code review)

title: Main Skill - ax CLI workflow guidance
description: Create skills/ax/SKILL.md with comprehensive ax CLI reference, ticket-driven development workflow, PR review workflow, and best practices for AI agents.

title: Integration - Settings and documentation
description: Update .claude/settings.local.json with ax command permissions. Test plugin installation locally. Document plugin usage in README.

title: Phase 2: Migrate Jira commands
description: Create Jira router (src/cli/commands/jira/index.ts). Migrate: search.ts, ticket.ts, comment.ts, comments.ts, desc.ts. Preserve existing logic, adapt to command interface.
